tooltip: Select Agitha as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Agitha focuses on growing Gohma efficiently and upgrading them.
Allows you to summon Agitha, a ranged support hero.
Allows the training of a stealthed assassin unit and a support unit that hinders enemies.
Gohma Princesses and Queens grow barbed spikes that passively damage melee attackers.
Access to a market and a support building.
